entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Imperfect IEnumerable<T> -> Span<T> collection expression conversion #71755
  • SemanticModel.GetOperation returns `null` for postfix-suppression #71753
  • IDE0290 (use primary constructor) code fixer produces invalid code #71749

Closed

  • Some services crash when interpolating strings using switch expressions #71754
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #71600
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Extract factory interface for AbstractSnippetCommandHandler #71752
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix issue with 'use primary constructor' when an assignment uses a suppression operator #71751
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only parse a single document when freezing documents with related linked files #71750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Make postfix `for` and `forr` snippets available for types with `Length` or `Count` property #71748
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Merged

  • Fix bootstrap log publish #71756
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Razor to register Json converters for functional tests #71746
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix intercepting an instance method with a generic extension method #71658
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make syntax list types into a "collection builder" types #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make the Roslyn code index CI use the LSIF generator just produced #71736
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure we don't leak the request info if a request is cancelled #71737
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Temporary storage #71362
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore "Remove properties from DocumentSpan" #71687
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add logging to track down a double dispose #71738
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not generating event field modifiers correctly #71739
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Regex source generator in compiler #71721
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
